author: Jaya Chandra
title: Worst Customer Satisfaction
content:
Amazon is not satisfying the customer and is  only interested to make more and more money.. I bought this phone from Amazon and 3 days earlier it had been delivered and when unpacked and unboxed i checked all the details and found that the back side at fingerprints side something was wrong and then I closely inspected then I found scratches on my new phone and while using I found the Fingerprint was not working correctly..  And was not responding or even vibrating on touch and after some use found that there was update and it was stated that after update the Fingerprint will be working properly. After updating and wasting 2 GB of my Internet i found that the option of fingerprints is missing from the settings option.
Full disgusting customer satisfaction from amazon

author: Amazon Customer
title: Defect product received. The volume key has stuck inside the phone, and unable to use it.
content: The volume key has stuck inside the phone, and unable to use it. Its Kind of Bend. I have checked on internet and saw so many similar cases. It has to rectify while manufacturing itself. I have raised case replacement but the process is like painful. Technician will take 5 to 7 working days to visit you to see the issue, once he sends the report to seller then they will proceed for replacement. The whole process takes 20 days approx or even more it seems. Mean while I booked this via No cost EMI offer, Now that also getting affected like once you raise replacement case, the Initial contact with back will be terminated and  for that bank will charge some money it seems. And again new contract will be made for new order or replacement. Even though issue was from seller, customer also need to suffer. Its very Bad!!

It is a utility phone with good front camera
Nothing exceptional
Not bad for daily use

Doesn't suite my taste
And they don't allow replacement if you don't like the colour

author: Ankur Ghosh
title: Picture Quality not so much good..as expected
content:
Rear flash is too much dimmer..
When you want to click a picture in absolute darkness picture becomes too much noisy and dimmer also.
Where as Note 5 has a brighter flash and pictures of it captured in darkness are absolutely fine.

Also the Front cam that's also not anything  special like 20MP quality..again the 5 MP front cam of Note 5 captures better selfies with or without flash.

title: Note5 pro

author: Praveen Krishnan
title: Mentioned Free Headphones and other Stuffs.. Only Phone, No Headphone..
content: It’s mentioned that there is FREE: Headphone + Noosy Pin + 2 pin 3.5mm Audio Jack + OTG + 3.5mm Speed Cable. But other than Noosy PIN, there was no Headphones or OTG Cable.

author: BALWINDER SINGH
title: Good phone to buy...
content:
Its a good device to buy under 10 k. Was worried about its built quality before buying it but found it worthy. Giving 5 star for its performance and for buity quality.
Camera quality is fine and front camera with led flashlite is awesome feature.
Youngsters and womens can prefer this phone more due to its camera quality, good performance on apps like tick tok and vigo. Battery is ok as in idle condition battery drains very less but once you start using internet the draining speed is high..  with very limited internet usage it can give battery life of about 2 days and otherwise 1 day backup.

author: Brang Seng
title: Pros and cons
content:
Front camera is great but the main camera is just good enough for me.. I'd say 3.5 out of 5 because though it takes good quality pictures, they aren't crispy and zoom-able enough to satisfy me.

I previously used galaxy Note 4 and its camera was freaking awesome.

But for 14999, this is the best you can get.

Fast fingerprint sensor and face detection + 6GB RAM at just 14999 is worth it. Battery is great too though it takes a little longer to charge.

Im very happy and satisfied with this product. The predictive text function of this phone is so good that it makes me feel like it knows what's on my mind.

The product was delivered as orderd without any scratches nor problems though it took 5 days to deliver.

Sound system is not so great but good enough for me.

I wish there was a dedicated SD card slot rather than a hybrid sim slot.

I highly recommend this phone. It's super smooth, runs like butter, fast, cheap and very reliable.

author: JAI PRAKASH GUPTA
title: An all Rounder phone from Redmi. Use it to beleive it
content:
I got this phone at an effective price of Rs 7200 after replacing my 2 year old redmi phone for rs 2800 and 10% discount on HDFC card during Republuc Day Sale. I can vouch cant ask for more in terms of specifications  at this  price point.
Picture: Rear Cameras are just too good for portrait shot. Normal photos taken have ample amount of details even in artificial lighting. Day light pics are excellent compared to phones from samsung at 18000 pruce range. Front Camera is awesome for selfies. My wife is loving it.
Battery - It takes around 3 hrs to get full charge. Battery lasts for more than 24 hours with lot of videos on hotstar and youtube. Game i have not downloaded any. Browsing and app shopping throughoutvthe day.
Performace - Its butter smooth no lag and feels nice to use.
Dispaly - Could have been better.

author: K Sai Rushi Raj
title: Middle Class Pocket Winner
content:
This phone company has always been making phones which target the middle class people like me. High Level specs with an affordable price tag is quite a boon to the Indian Market. Doesn't compete with Flagships as it does lack few Flagship qualities like IP Resistance and Etc .
But overall better than many phones in this budget bracket. XD

author: RAJU CHANDUPATLA
title: Not a red one. No replacement because this unique pinkish red invented by MI
content:
Given 3 rating because of the red color. Which they are saying red, but color is pinkish red. You won't like this red color on your phone back. So, weird look is gone.
Other than this phone is superb for the price. Got the 6+64 for 11700/- with bank offer.
Front can is superb. Back cam is ok even though with dual lenses. You can't take good indoor photos with rear camera. Got the emui10 upgrade. Battery is good for fullday. But, it's not red in color even girls doesn't like this type of unique red. I donno where from the world they invented this red color. If you have doubt just go to any min stores. Even on the top of box displaying red. But inside you will get fooled. Don't buy red choose other colors
